name: centipede_damascus
text: Oh no! UNIX!

name: saint
text: Eunichs?!

name: centipede_damascus
text: Eunuchs.

name: stormypinkness
text: Fat people who's egos are boosted at every mkdir.

name: stormypinkness
text: I feel the need to correct my grammar and acknowledge that the word should be whose.

name: epicurus
text: And for that I salute you.

name: cailetshadow
text: It says something about Achewood's readership that a grammar correction gets 20 chubbies. :)

name: em2
text: Far, far more than the original post.

name: spaceandrew
text:
As I write this, it currently has 76 chubbies and 2 lames.

I love Achewood readers almost as much as I love Achewood itself.

name: soticoto
text:
It makes me want to err against the English language, just so I can then apologetically correct my grievous atrocity.
... But to turn a mere accident into a cold-blooded crime is something I cannot bring myself to do.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Go ahead. Mkmydir. Punk.

name: abe
text: bin/bash

name: rational
text: man ebay

name: dorothypoopbot
text: Great avatar/text combo. Tell us all about eBay, Notorious L.I.N.C.O.L.N.

name: mortshire
text: unix is being a dick, all BEEP BEEP.

name: ssddr
text: To be fair, unix is made by fat people.

name: spectre
text: A comment left by spectre was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by relaxing, Zoltan, Darthemed)

name: bixschmix
text: Also to be fair, so is everything else.

name: spinynorman
text:
Not porn.

...at least, not good porn.

name: catgrl131
text: There's a growing sub-genre called Softboy. SB.

name: spinynorman
text: I have been schooled.

name: fuzzyshoo
text: Don't let em' school ya, or even try to fool ya.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: by fat people, for fat people.

name: philosophe
text: They need to get 'Beef up ins.

name: stuart
text: This is Unix! I KNOW Unix!

name: riazm
text:
I know Unix too, every time I do a console command it's like writing:

"I have failed at life."

name: lawbot
text: The last time I turned on my unix box was by accident. That said, I do use cygwin.

name: spandrelbot
text: Thank you, Lex.

name: goosey
text: Computing Science lecture today, our lecturer said "Unix is made by, among other people, astronomers." and this strip came unbidden to mind.

name: relaxing
text: Seriously, astronomers?

name: goosey
text: That's what he said. I haven't been able to find any other reference to it, though.

name: ssddr
text: Maybe he meant people who are Astronomical objects, but not necessarily in the field of astronomy?

name: dybrar
text:
All exerting their own not inconsiderable gravitational pull
Smaller people completely orbiting them

name: rowboat
text: A comment left by rowboat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by MrMojoRisin, trialandterror, Overmedicated)

name: thatcrazycommie
text: UNIX does have eBay, but it's still in beta.

name: jackparsons
text: Unix has been in beta for 30 years, when I started using it in 1979.  Linux is in permanent alpha.

name: sticks
text: I'm glad they whittled it down to one computer nerd later on.

name: mattylite
text: Cornelius and Philippe seem like they're in some UNIX PR video, where they are 2nd-rate actors who are playing the role of some people who hold Common Misconceptions about UNIX.  All some hot nerd chick who looks like she works at Best Buy walking towards the camera, asking if you knew UNIX had ebay, and if you knew the average weight of UNIX programmers was actually on average only 4% higher than Windows...

name: catgrl131
text: Fuck you for being some hot dumbass employed by a computer company! And fuck your calculated tight black pants!

name: mattylite
text: SCREW YOU, HOT DUMBASS! FUCK YOU!

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i would.

name: snowman
text: Philippe's line pushed this one up to a 3 for me.  Otherwise, eh.

name: dusty
text: I tested out of a class on unix once, I didn't know a thing about it but the test was computerized and they didn't block the web browser or google. Yeah it was a cheap way to pass but that's how I would get by if I ever for some reason have to use Unix again.
